test-case.name: Literals066
test-case.description: Test the escaping of the ' (apostrophe) and " (quotation) characters as part of an XML element constructor

test-case.name: Literals067
test-case.description: Test the escaping of the ' (apostrophe) and " (quotation) characters as part of an XML attribute constructor. Notice that the " (quote) characters need to be entitized in the attribute content for XML validity

test-case.description: Test the escaping of the ' (apostrophe) and " (quotation) characters as part of an XML text node constructor

test-case.name: K-Literals-1
test-case.description: A test whose essence is: `'fo''o' eq 'fo''o'`.

test-case.name: K-Literals-2
test-case.description: A test whose essence is: `'foo' eq "foo"`.

test-case.name: K-Literals-3
test-case.description: A test whose essence is: `'f'oo'`.

test-case.name: K-Literals-4
test-case.description: '""""' is a valid string literal.

test-case.name: K-Literals-5
test-case.description: '''''' is a valid string literal.

test-case.name: K-Literals-6
test-case.description: '"fo""""' is a valid string literal.

test-case.name: K-Literals-7
test-case.description: '"f"oo"' is an invalid string literal.

test-case.name: K-Literals-8
test-case.description: '3.' is a valid number literal.

test-case.name: K-Literals-9
test-case.description: '.3' is a valid number literal.

test-case.name: K-Literals-10
test-case.description: A test whose essence is: `1.3e-3 instance of xs:double`.

test-case.name: K-Literals-11
test-case.description: A test whose essence is: `1.e+3 instance of xs:double`.

test-case.name: K-Literals-12
test-case.description: A test whose essence is: `1.e3 instance of xs:double`.

test-case.name: K-Literals-13
test-case.description: A test whose essence is: `1231.123e3 instance of xs:double`.

test-case.name: K-Literals-14
test-case.description: A test whose essence is: `1.E3 instance of xs:double`.

test-case.name: K-Literals-15
test-case.description: A test whose essence is: `-1231.123e3 instance of xs:double`.

test-case.name: K-Literals-16
test-case.description: A test whose essence is: `3 instance of xs:integer`.

test-case.name: K-Literals-17
test-case.description: A test whose essence is: `3.3 instance of xs:decimal`.

test-case.name: K-Literals-18
test-case.description: A test whose essence is: `3.3e1 instance of xs:double`.

test-case.name: K-Literals-19
test-case.description: A test whose essence is: `"a xs:string" instance of xs:string`.

test-case.name: K-Literals-20
test-case.description: A test whose essence is: `not(xs:double("NaN"))`.

test-case.name: K-Literals-21
test-case.description: A test whose essence is: `not(xs:float("NaN"))`.

test-case.name: K-Literals-22
test-case.description: A test whose essence is: `xs:float("NaN") instance of xs:float`.

test-case.name: K-Literals-23
test-case.description: '3 >E 2' is a syntatically invalid expression.

test-case.name: K-Literals-24
test-case.description: A syntactically invalid query, reminding of somekind of literal.

test-case.name: K-Literals-25
test-case.description: A syntactically invalid query.

test-case.name: K-Literals-26
test-case.description: '432f542' is a syntactically invalid expression.

test-case.name: K-Literals-27
test-case.description: '.54.45' is a syntactically invalid expression.

test-case.name: K-Literals-28
test-case.description: '.3' is a valid literal.

test-case.name: K-Literals-29
test-case.description: An empty string is not a valid XPath/XQuery expression.

test-case.name: K-Literals-30
test-case.description: '{1}' is a syntactically invalid XQuery expression.

test-case.name: K-Literals-31
test-case.description: An invalid character reference.

test-case.name: K-Literals-31a
test-case.description: An invalid character reference is not invalid in XPath.

modified.change: Removed quotes from expected result. See bug #14435

test-case.description: An invalid decimal character reference.

test-case.description: An invalid decimal character reference.

test-case.description: An invalid decimal character reference.

test-case.description: An invalid decimal character reference.

test-case.description: An invalid decimal character reference, they cannot contain whitespace.

test-case.description: Simple test of a decimal character reference.

test-case.description: An invalid hexa-decimal character reference.

test-case.description: An invalid hexa-decimal character reference.

test-case.description: An invalid hexa-decimal character reference.

test-case.description: An invalid hexa-decimal character reference, they cannot contain whitespace.

test-case.name: K-Literals-42
test-case.description: 'LT' is not a predefined character reference.

test-case.name: K-Literals-43
test-case.description: 'lte' is not a predefined character reference.

test-case.name: K-Literals-44
test-case.description: '&' must be escaped.

test-case.name: K-Literals-45
test-case.description: An invalid hexa-decimal character reference.

test-case.name: K-Literals-46
test-case.description: Test containing all predefined character references and one hexa and decimal character reference.

test-case.name: K-Literals-47
test-case.description: Simple test of a hexa decimal character reference.

test-case.name: K-Literals-47a
test-case.description: Simple test of a hexa decimal character reference: not recognized in XPath

test-case.name: K-Literals-48
test-case.description: The 'x' in a hexa decimal character reference must be lower case.

test-case.name: K-Literals-49
test-case.description: An '&' character reference embedded in other text.

test-case.name: K-Literals-50
test-case.description: Character references are only allowed inside string literals.

test-case.name: K2-Literals-1
test-case.description: An invalid character reference.

test-case.name: K2-Literals-2
test-case.description: An invalid character reference.

test-case.name: K2-Literals-3
test-case.description: Preceeding zeros are allowed in character references.

test-case.name: K2-Literals-4
test-case.description: Use a relatively large xs:integer literal.

test-case.name: K2-Literals-5
test-case.description: Use a relatively small xs:integer literal.

test-case.name: K2-Literals-6
test-case.description: Use a relatively large xs:decimal literal.

test-case.name: K2-Literals-7
test-case.description: Use a relatively small xs:decimal literal, that might result in an underflow.

test-case.name: K2-Literals-8
test-case.description: An xs:double literal with a large significand.

test-case.name: K2-Literals-9
test-case.description: An xs:double literal with a small significand.

test-case.name: K2-Literals-10
test-case.description: Attempt to trigger underflow in an xs:double literal.

test-case.name: K2-Literals-11
test-case.description: Negative zero, as a double.

test-case.name: K2-Literals-12
test-case.description: Zero, as a double.

test-case.name: K2-Literals-13
test-case.description: Negative zero, as a decimal.

test-case.name: K2-Literals-14
test-case.description: Zero, as a decimal.

test-case.name: K2-Literals-15
test-case.description: A literal looking like a negative zero integer.

test-case.name: K2-Literals-16
test-case.description: Use a character reference that is a decimal 32 bit overflow.

test-case.name: K2-Literals-17
test-case.description: Use a character reference that is a hexa decimal 32 bit overflow.

test-case.name: K2-Literals-18
test-case.description: Use a character reference that is a decimal 64 bit overflow.

test-case.name: K2-Literals-19
test-case.description: Use a character reference that is a hexa decimal 64 bit overflow.

test-case.name: K2-Literals-20
test-case.description: Expressions can't be separated by semi-colons.

test-case.name: K2-Literals-21
test-case.description: XQuery doesn't have a syntax for expressing hexa decimals.

test-case.name: K2-Literals-22
test-case.description: A minus sign is not allowed in hexa character references.

test-case.name: K2-Literals-23
test-case.description: A minus sign is not allowed in decimal character references.

test-case.name: K2-Literals-24
test-case.description: A plus sign is not allowed in hexa character references.

test-case.name: K2-Literals-25
test-case.description: A plus sign is not allowed in decimal character references.

test-case.name: K2-Literals-26
test-case.description: Only digits are allowed in decimal character references.

test-case.name: K2-Literals-27
test-case.description: 'W' is an invalid character in a hexa character reference.

test-case.name: K2-Literals-28
test-case.description: Ensure that EOLs are normalized in string literals.

modified.change: code point values to match the query

test-case.name: K2-Literals-29
test-case.description: A syntactically invalid character reference.

test-case.name: K2-Literals-30
test-case.description: Check EBNF 142.

test-case.name: K2-Literals-31
test-case.description: Check EBNF 142(#2).

test-case.name: K2-Literals-32
test-case.description: Numeric literals can end with a dot.

test-case.name: K2-Literals-33
test-case.description: Two subsequent right curlies.

test-case.name: K2-Literals-34
test-case.description: A main module without query body.

test-case.name: K2-Literals-35
test-case.description: Attempt to evaluate a library module. The specification does not specify what an implementation should do, so we allow any output and any error code.
test-case.test: module namespace prefix = "http://example.com"; declare function prefix:myFunction() { 1 };

test-case.name: K2-Literals-36
test-case.description: Attempt to evaluate a library module. The specification does not specify what an implementation should do, so we allow any output and any error code. This is a simpler version of the previous query.

test-case.name: K2-Literals-37
test-case.description: Ensure 'import' is properly parsed as a keyword.

test-case.name: K2-Literals-38
test-case.description: Ensure 'schema' is properly parsed as a keyword.

test-case.name: K2-Literals-39
test-case.description: Ensure that EOLs are normalized in string literals, using single quotes.

modified.change: Test-case now references the original XQTS test-case. Corrected expected result
